mapper.sql: id, createID, publishTime, updateTime, title, systemCategory, applicationArea, linkman, companyName, telephone, email, province, city, area, address, cooperation, type, status, views
mapper.select:
select t.id, t.createID, date_format(t.publishTime,'%Y-%m-%d') publishTime, date_format(t.updateTime,'%Y-%m-%d') updateTime, t.title, dc.name systemCategory, dn.name applicationArea, t.linkman, t.companyName, t.telephone, t.email, po.name province,ct.name city,ar.name area, t.address, t.cooperation, t.type, t.status,t.notes from t_tech_cooperation t left join t_dictionary_province po on po.code = t.province left join t_dictionary_city ct on ct.code = t.city left join t_dictionary_area ar on ar.code = t.area left join t_dictionary_constant dc on dc.code = t.systemCategory and dc.type =19 left join t_dictionary_constant dn on dn.code = t.applicationArea and dn.type =18 where t.id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
and t.type = #{type}

select t.id, t.title, dc.name systemCategory, dn.name applicationArea,t.cooperation,t.notes from t_tech_cooperation t left join t_dictionary_constant dc on dc.code = t.systemCategory and dc.type =19 left join t_dictionary_constant dn on dn.code = t.applicationArea and dn.type =18 where t.id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select t.id, t.createID, date_format(t.publishTime,'%Y-%m-%d') publishTime, date_format(t.updateTime,'%Y-%m-%d') updateTime, t.title, t.systemCategory, t.applicationArea, t.linkman, t.companyName, t.telephone, t.email, t.province,t.city,t.area, t.address, t.cooperation, t.type, t.status,t.notes from t_tech_cooperation t where t.id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select t.id, t.createID, date_format(t.publishTime,'%Y-%m-%d') publishTime, date_format(t.updateTime,'%Y-%m-%d') updateTime, t.title, t.systemCategory,dc.name systemCategoryName, t.applicationArea,dn.name applicationAreaName, t.linkman, t.companyName, t.telephone, t.email, t.province,pv.name provinceName,t.city,ct.name cityName,t.area,ar.name areaName,t.address, t.cooperation, t.type, t.status,t.notes from t_tech_cooperation t left join t_dictionary_province pv on pv.code = t.province left join t_dictionary_city ct on ct.code = t.city left join t_dictionary_area ar on ar.code = t.area left join t_dictionary_constant dc on dc.code = t.systemCategory and dc.type =19 left join t_dictionary_constant dn on dn.code = t.applicationArea and dn.type =18 where t.id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert:
insert into t_tech_cooperation
id,
createID,
publishTime, updateTime,
title,
systemCategory,
applicationArea,
linkman,
companyName,
telephone,
email,
province,
city,
area,
address,
cooperation,
type,
status,
views,
notes,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{createID,jdbcType=BIGINT},
now(), now(),
#{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{systemCategory,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{applicationArea,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{linkman,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update t_tech_cooperation
createID = #{createID,jdbcType=BIGINT},
publishTime = #{publishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updateTime = now(),
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
systemCategory = #{systemCategory,jdbcType=INTEGER},
applicationArea = #{applicationArea,jdbcType=INTEGER},
linkman = #{linkman,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
companyName = #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
telephone = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
area = #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cooperation = #{cooperation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
views = #{views,jdbcType=BIGINT},
notes = #{notes,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
reason = #{reason},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
update t_tech_cooperation set views = views+1 where id = #{id}
